siteMetadata.title: Blog by Alex Jiang
siteMetadata.subtitle: Alex Jiang's personal blog built by Gatsby

frontmatter.title: Big Changes in the Small World
frontmatter.description: an introduction to Hierarchical Navigable Small World (HNSW) algorithm in machine learning.

frontmatter.title: My Understanding of fastText
frontmatter.description: the facebook fastText model is a great tool for text classification and text representation learning.

frontmatter.title: My Understanding of Transformers and Self-Attention
frontmatter.description: a detailed explanation of the Transformer architecture and self-attention mechanism in deep learning.

frontmatter.title: Rehearsal of Machine Learning on Coursera
frontmatter.description: the rehearsal lessons means a lot to me, it is a good way to review the knowledge and skills.

frontmatter.title: Understanding the GLUE Dataset
frontmatter.description: a summary of the General Language Understanding Evaluation (GLUE) benchmark dataset.
